15 . debt the tables below summarize our outstanding debt at 30 september 2016 and 2015 : total debt . the weighted average interest rate of short-term borrowings outstanding at 30 september 2016 and 2015 was 1.1% ( 1.1 % ) and .8% ( .8 % ) , respectively . cash paid for interest , net of amounts capitalized , was $ 121.1 in 2016 , $ 97.5 in 2015 , and $ 132.4 in 2014. . 
Question: considering the year 2016 , what is the short-term debt as a percent of total debt?
